about_the_game:
1. What kind of work is this (Free Adventure Setting)?

 

Adventure and Study English in a Fantasy World (Episode 7) is a highly challenging RPG game that also serves as an English learning aid. Players can save the world by completing pure adventure quests or by quickly leveling up through English vocabulary learning. These two methods can be independent or complementary.

 

2. Game Features:

 Forge the Ultimate Master - Life Skills System: Develop various skills to enhance your character.

Turn Villages Profitable - Donate and Build: Contribute to village development and construct your own house.

Marriage System: Build a family and have children.

Dual Exercise System: Exercise excessively and you might face health consequences, use with caution.

English Vocabulary Learning: It's okay if you don't want to learn! ^^

Endless Adventures: Explore the most challenging Endless Sea and seek out precious pirate treasure.

 

3. What You'll Gain After Finishing the Game:

You will have fun playing the game.

In the 10,000+ Vocabulary Series, you will learn an additional 1,200 words.

Each game in the series has 95% non-repetitive vocabulary. If you have a vocabulary of 8,000+ words, you're equivalent to a level 4 professional English test taker (TEM-4), an intermediate level passer of the GEPT (Taiwan), and you're on the verge of achieving high scores in IELTS and TOEFL.

 

4. Challenges After Defeating the Demon King:

Level 100 is just the beginning, and mastering 1,000 skills is just being an apprentice. After reaching the peak, explore the unfinished creations left behind by the goddess when she created the world. There are surprises everywhere.

content_descriptors.notes:
"This game contains 12+ images that are only visible in specific scenes or when using certain items. Additionally, players can access the "Goddess's Creation Base," the final scene, once they reach level 9000 or above. All 12+ images can be viewed within this scene. The most explicit content in these images is limited to the display of male and female underwear, with no nudity of breasts or genitalia.

The game does not contain any content depicting sexual assault, drug use, alcohol abuse, or self-harm.

When entering a purchased suite and interacting with a partner, the dialogue may suggest the characters sleeping together. However, the visual representation will only show a 12+ image of the male and female characters embracing, with the most explicit content limited to the display of male and female underwear. There will be no nudity of breasts or genitalia."
